DOC.brief_summary: This is a pilot study utilizing trans-abdominal ECG and Doppler Ultrasounds to assess the feasibility of extracting fECGs in a volunteer population.
DOC.criteria: Subjects must be pregnant women at least 18 years of age. Subject's fetus must be between the gestational ages of 16 weeks and term. Subjects must be able to tolerate 20 minutes (per fetus for which transabdominal ECG and Doppler ultrasounds will be performed) in the supine position. Subjects are willing to provide informed consent and are willing to participate in all procedures necessary to complete the study. Subjects must not have a physical or mental condition, in the opinion of the investigator, which will limit their ability to provide adequate consent.
